bill.summary:
AMBER Alert Nationwide Act of 2018
This bill makes several modifications to the AMBER Alert grant program, including to make all U.S. territories eligible for grants.
Additionally, the bill reauthorizes through FY2022 AMBER Alert grants for notification and communication systems along highways.
